oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1955-07-30 - Part 1 [transfer 1]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from July 30, 1955. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Carl Smith (host/performer), guest performers the Wilburn Brothers, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Dale Potter, Lew Childre, Del Wood, the Duke Of Paducah, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Carl Smith; Jordanaires; Wilburn Brothers; Dale Potter; Lew Childre; Del Wood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Carl Smith -- Don't Tease Me (Carl Smith) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Carl Smith) -- Carl Smith introduces the Jordanaires -- Let's Make A Joyful Noise (Jordanaires) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Carl Smith) -- Carl Smith introduces the Wilburn Brothers -- I Wanna Wanna Wanna (Wilburn Brothers) -- Carl Smith introduces Dale Potter and Lew Childre -- Old Joe Clark (Dale Potter fiddle, Lew Childre calls) -- Carl Smith talks -- Wait A Little Longer Please Jesus (Carl Smith) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Carl Smith) -- Prince Albert jingle (Carl Smith) -- Carl Smith introduces Del Wood -- Twelfth Street Rag (Del Wood) -- Carl Smith introduces the Duke Of Paducah
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Smith, Carl, 1927-2010; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jordanaires (Musical group); Duke of Paducah, 1901-1986; Childre, Lew, 1901-1961; Potter, Dale; Wilburn Brothers; Wilburn, Teddy; Wilburn, Doyle
